scripts.watch-test-plugins: when-changed -1 -s tests/* chrome-extension/* chrome-extension/plugins/* -c bin/test-plugins.sh tests/test-plugin.js
scripts.test-debug-watch: when-changed -1 -s tests/* chrome-extension/* -c bash -c 'node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha debug tests/tests.js'
scripts.watch: when-changed -1 -s tests/* src/* -c bash -c "./node_modules/.bin/riot chrome-extension/views/tags chrome-extension/views/tags/all.js && tsc -p ./tsconfig.background.json && tsc -p ./tsconfig.content-scripts.json && node bin/build.js ; rm chrome-extension/js/background-amd.js && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha tests/tests.js "
